text: How can I use python to get the system name?
Note: I doNOTmean "Window XP", "Linux", "OS X", etc.

childList.text: Note: I doNOTmean "Window XP", "Linux", "OS X", etc.

text: I'm writing a chat program for a local network.
I would like to know who says what so I would like to use python to get the user-set computer name(The name of the computer when you view the local network.
Another note: The network is already set up(file sharing, VNC, etc).
I do not need help with that.

childList.text: Another note: The network is already set up(file sharing, VNC, etc). I do not need help with that.
